tables.name: series
tables.sql: CREATE TABLE series(seriesid INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, series TEXT NOT NULL)

tables.name: aliases_series
tables.sql: CREATE TABLE aliases_series (seriesaliasid INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,seriesalias TEXT NOT NULL,series INT NOT NULL REFERENCES series(seriesid), language,UNIQUE(seriesalias,series) ON CONFLICT IGNORE)

tables.name: subseries
tables.sql: CREATE TABLE subseries(subseries TEXT, series INT NOT NULL, subseriesid INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, FOREIGN KEY(series) REFERENCES series(seriesid))

tables.name: aliases_subseries
tables.sql: CREATE TABLE aliases_subseries (subseriesaliasid INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,subseriesalias TEXT NOT NULL,subseries INT NOT NULL REFERENCES subseries(subseriesid), language,UNIQUE(subseriesalias,subseries) ON CONFLICT IGNORE)

tables.name: users
tables.sql: CREATE TABLE "users" (userid INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, name TEXT NOT NULL UNIQUE, salt TEXT NOT NULL, hash TEXT NOT NULL)

tables.name: sessions
tables.sql: CREATE TABLE "sessions" (sessionid INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, userid INT REFERENCES "users"(userid) ON DELETE CASCADE, authtoken TEXT NOT NULL, authtime DATETIME NOT NULL)

tables.name: installed_apps
tables.sql: CREATE TABLE "installed_apps" (installid INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, module TEXT NOT NULL, version TEXT NOT NULL, UNIQUE(module))

tables.name: user_apps
tables.sql: CREATE TABLE "user_apps" (uappid INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,  userid INT NOT NULL REFERENCES "users"(userid), installid INT NOT NULL REFERENCES "installed_apps"(installid) ON DELETE CASCADE, UNIQUE(userid,installid) ON CONFLICT IGNORE)

tables.name: genres
tables.sql: CREATE TABLE genres (genreid INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,name TEXT NOT NULL UNIQUE,abbreviation TEXT UNIQUE,heavy BOOLEAN DEFAULT 0,spoiler BOOLEAN DEFAULT 0)

tables.name: genrelist_subseries
tables.sql: CREATE TABLE genrelist_subseries (genrelistid INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,genre INT NOT NULL REFERENCES genres(genreid),subseries INT NOT NULL REFERENCES subseries(subseriesid),UNIQUE(genre,subseries) ON CONFLICT IGNORE)

tables.name: yearseason
tables.sql: CREATE TABLE yearseason (yearseasonid INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, season TEXT NOT NULL UNIQUE)

tables.name: company
tables.sql: CREATE TABLE company (companyid INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, company TEXT NOT NULL, role TEXT NOT NULL)

tables.name: aliases_company
tables.sql: CREATE TABLE aliases_company (companyaliasid INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, companyalias TEXT NOT NULL, company INT NOT NULL REFERENCES company(companyid), language,UNIQUE(companyalias,company) ON CONFLICT IGNORE)
